name: Five Bars
description:
Terrorists kidnapped your girl and strapped her to an explosive device! With your hacking skills and mobile phone, however, you were able to prevent the detonation of the bomb! But it's only a matter of time before they figure out your meddling ways, so you'll need to find their headquarters and save her!

Complete minigames and defeat terrorists as you follow the path of mobile hotspots that will lead you to your girl!

Controls:

-Move: WASD

-Jump: Space

-Sprint: Shift

-Fire: Left Mouse Button

-Reload: R

Open Phone when being counterhacked: Tab

Pause Game: Esc

Good luck on your expedition; you'll need it!

Created by a Solo-Developer in 8 days for the Lost Relic Game Jam 2022
